textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Leg opening: 13in / 33cm Inseam: 25in / 63.5cm Rise: 9in / 23cm MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. 56% acetate/31% polyester/13% metallic. Fabric: Patterned lamé. Metallic thread sends a crisp, geometric pattern across these slim 4-pocket Tibi trousers, lending vintage charm to the cropped silhouette. Extended-tab, hook-and-eye closure and zip fly. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer After leaving a marketing job in Manhattan and moving to Hong Kong, Amy Smilovic began designing a line of smart, pretty dresses. She continues to travel all over the world and finds inspiration for her clothing in exotic locations. The Tibi buzzword is "casual chic," and Smilovic makes sure that each of her designs is something that would fit right in with her artsy, Soho lifestyle. Her collections reflect her best assets: naiveté and "an absolute love of pretty things." See all Tibi reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
